title: GT 4.0 Workspace Management Service: System Administrator's Guide

section.title: Introduction
section.para: This guide contains installation and configuration information for system administrators installing the Workspace Management Service. It explains how to install, configure and test the installation.
This information is in addition to the basic installation instructions in the GT 4.0 System Administrator's Guide.

section.title: Building and installing
section.para: Describe how to build and install the Workspace Management Service.

section.title: Configuring
section.para: Describe ways to configure a Workspace Management Service installation.

section.title: Deploying
section.para: Describe how to deploy the Workspace Management Service in a particular environment (standalone container and TomCat).

section.title: Testing
section.para: Describe how to test the Workspace Management Service installation.
